We play in the Sports hall of St Cyres School in Penarth: Sully Rd, Penarth CF64 2XP. There is free onsite parking at the school.

When you arrive at the school, report to reception for directions. Alternatively, go down the stairs immediately in front of you and, once at the bottom, go through the double doors immediately on your left. You will find us at the end of the corridor.

To receive regular updates and reminders about cmub nights, join our official WhatsApp group by clicking [here](https://chat.whatsapp.com/GPNbTQ2nTME0I2vdgnwfBs). It is open to all members and non-members.

For all other inquiries, please email us at [penarthttc@gmail.com](mailto:penarthttc@gmail.com).
